Created attachment 543412
Screenshot; left with hw accel, right without; top zoomed; bottom normal size

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; de; rv:1.9.2.18pre) Gecko/20110509 Firefox/3.6.18pre
Build ID: 20110509225457

Steps to reproduce:

I have a menu with some floating block elements. If I enable hw acceleration, the background color bleeds over the bottom border of those floating block elements! Everything is fine without hw acceleration OR if the element does not float.

Tested in Firefox 4, 5 and 6a2.


Actual results:

The background (white) bleeds over the bottom border.


Expected results:

The background shoukd not bleed and stay within the border.
comments.author: ronny.perinke@gmx.de
